name: Co(s)mic problem
description:
Pasture Games presents a Patryk Baran game:

Co(s)mic problem

Oh no! Something broke off yours TV 's antenna. You must go outside for it... to not to buy a new one!

Collect randomly scattered lost parts...

Refill your jetpack...

To not to buy a new antenna and save some money !!!

Game was mostly created during a hackaton called ,,Spacehack" in 2020. Then I continue developing it in 2021. And there it is! Enjoy :D
